import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; function App() { let [number, setNumber] = useState(""); function handleClick(e) { setNumber(number + e); console.log(number); } function handleCalc() { setNumber(eval(number)); } return (
handleClick(7)}>7
handleClick(8)}>8
handleClick(9)}>9
handleClick(4)}>4
handleClick(5)}>5
handleClick(6)}>6
handleClick(1)}> 1
handleClick(2)}>2
handleClick(3)}>3
handleClick(0)}>0
handleClick(".")}>.
setNumber("")}> C
=
{number}
); } export default App;
